description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter class 'MoveHistoryAdapter' used for displaying a list of chess moves or game history within an Android application. It manages a list of move strings and provides methods to update and bind data to the view.

classes.name: MoveHistoryAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView Adapter for displaying move history in a list, managing move items and creating/binding view holders.

methods.name: submitMoves
methods.description: Updates the list of moves and refreshes the display.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new TextView-based view holder for a move item.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of move items.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds move data to the view holder.

inner_classes.name: VH
inner_classes.description: ViewHolder class holding a TextView for a move item.
